com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.socket

Class SharedSocketAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.configuration.AbstractConfigurable
      • com.camerontec.catalys.server.component.ComponentHelper
        • com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.socket.SharedSocketAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISharedFixSource, IComponent, IHasAttributes, IConfigurable, IRegisterable, Runnable

    public class SharedSocketAdapter
extends ComponentHelper
implements Runnable, ISharedFixSource
    The component which is shared between FIX sessions containing a SocketAdapter component.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ACK_TIMEOUT
      Definition of the attribute that defines the acknowledgement timeout.
      static String FULL_MSG_ACKS
      Definition of the attribute item that defines whether or not to send the full message back as an acknowledgment.
      static String KEEP_ALIVE
      Definition of the attribute item that defines whether or not to set SO_KEEPALIVE on the socket.
      static String LARGE_MESSAGES
      Definition of the attribute item that defines whether or not to use large message sizes on the socket.
      static String LISTEN_PORT
      Definition of the attribute that defines the port on which to listen for client connections.
      static String MSG_ID_IN_ACK
      Definition of the attribute that indicates if msg ids are returned by the socket client in acks.
      static String MULTI_SESSION
      Definition of the attribute item that defines whether or not to allow the adapter to use multiple sessions.

        public static final String MSG_ID_IN_ACK
        Definition of the attribute that indicates if msg ids are returned by the socket client in acks. For backward compatibility.

      • register

        public void register(IConnectionPoint connectionPoint,
                     IFIXSource fixSource)
        Description copied from interface: ISharedFixSource
        Register a FIX source associated with the given party.

        The fireMessage method will pass messages for this connection point to the given FIX source.

        Specified by:
        register in interface ISharedFixSource
        Parameters:
        connectionPoint - Connection point with which this IFIXSource object is associated.
        fixSource - Source which will receive messages for this party.

      • refreshStateFromAttributes

        public void refreshStateFromAttributes()
                                throws Exception
        Refreshes the state of this object from the values of its configured attributes. Notes:
        • Shared adapters (i.e. multiSession=true) are not refreshable.
        • The 'port' attribute is not refreshable. It is only set once at startup when openComponent is called.
        • The 'multiSession' attribute is not refreshable. It is only set once at startup when openComponent is called.
        Specified by:
        refreshStateFromAttributes in interface IHasAttributes
        Overrides:
        refreshStateFromAttributes in class ComponentHelper
        Throws:
        Exception - If the refresh failed for any reason.
        See Also:
        SocketAdapter Attributes
